notes.title: Authors' contributions
notes.p: The individual contributions of each author have been outlined below: Conception and design: FS, JL, MG, MLP. Development of methodology: JRT, RW. Acquisition of data (provided animals, acquired and managed patients, provided facilities, etc.): WE-R. Analysis and interpretation of data (e.g. statistical analysis, biostatistics, computational analysis): JRT, MMT, MD, JL, RDH, MLP. Writing, review, and/or revision of the manuscript: WE-R, JL, PM, JRT, RDH, MG, MLP, RW, MMT, MD, FS. Administrative, technical, or material support (i.e., reporting or organizing data, constructing databases): JL, PM, JRT, MMT, MD. Study supervision: JL, PM, MLP. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
